result.arabic_text: قُلۡ أَرُونِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلۡحَقۡتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
result.translation: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Nimunyereke ibigirwamana mwamubangikanyije na byo.” Nta na kimwe! Ahubwo We ni Allah (wenyine), Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Nyirubugenge buhambaye.
